title: Where do I send reports of scripters?
body:
Other then after a game (that does not seem to do anything)

Where can I send a report for someone Scripting?

replies.body:
As *Wolfess* mentioned, reporting a player after a match is a great choice. Your report will flag the account for review and if we find anything fishy, we'll take action!

For more information on reports, check out [**our FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player). Let me know if you have any other questions.

Guy is still playing.  Last season he was .5 - 2.8 KDA on 4 champs
This season he is ~5-15 KDA on every champ he plays (over 20 champs) and has a win rate of 76%

No one gains skill like that in one season.  So he is scripting or he is having the account boosted by a pro.
Scripters account is still active and is climbing fast.  100% win rate for his jungle games this from someone who last season had a 0% win rate over 15 games.....
The after-game report button is sufficient.
